title: Investigating intermittent immersion during osmotic dehydration of mango (Mangifera indica L. Moench). Part A: Determination of optimal conditions for mango (Mangifera indica L. Moench) dehydration impregnation by immersion (D2I) and intermittent immersion (D3I)
